Name:
HMS Quality
HMAS Quality
Builder: Swan, Hunter and Wigham Richardson's Limited
Motto: Age Dum Agis (Latin: Do as You Do)
awards:
Battle honours:
North Africa 1942–43
Sabang 1944
Okinawa 1945
Japan 1945
Fate:
Transferred to RAN
Sold for scrap
Length:
358 ft 3 in (109.19 m) length overall
339 ft 6 in (103.48 m) between perpendiculars
Propulsion: 2 Admiralty 3-drum boilers, Parsons Impulse turbines, 40,000 shp (30,000 kW)
Range: 4,680 nautical miles (8,670 km; 5,390 mi) at 20 knots (37 km/h; 23 mph)
Armament:
4 × QF 4.7 inch Mk IX guns
1 × quadruple 2-pounder pom-pom
6 × 20 mm Oerlikon guns
4 × depth charge throwers
2 × quadruple 21 inch (533 mm) torpedo tube sets
